title: Status Effects
content: . Mirror of Loss Gain +2 to an Ability Score of choice. Sacrifice the knowledge of the Necromancy of Thay to the Mirror of Loss in the Cloister of Sombre Embrace. Alternatively, offer a prayer (25 Religion Check), then sacrifice a piece of your memories (-2 to an Ability Score of choice which can be cured with Remove Curse) for a +1 stat.
